sourcesContent:
import './rule.css' function Rule() { return (

How to Play

Based on the game difficult mode
  • normal: 6 opportunities to guess a 6 letter word
  • hard: 5 opportunities to guess a 7 letter word
If you guess a word less than expected number of letters, system will prompt you and let you try again without deducting the attempts
If the length of the word is expected, the color of each cell will change to show how close your guess was to the word

Examples

We have a word
W
I
N
N
E
R

Expected word: WINNER

F
U
T
U
R
E

Letters R and E exist in WINNER, but they are placed in wrong positions

M
O
T
H
E
R

Letters E and R are put in the right position

) } export default Rule
